summary: Comprehensive testing of HR Platform Onboarding Module completed. Backend APIs achieved 100% success rate (23/23 tests passed). Frontend testing confirmed all onboarding features including template CRUD, onboarding assignment, task completion, employee view, and responsive design. Fixed 2 bugs during testing: (1) Employee 'My Onboarding' navigation link was missing, (2) /api/onboardings/my endpoint wasn't finding employees by email correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: Create template with tasks (5 tasks, multiple categories)
Backend: Update template (name, duration, welcome message)
Backend: Get onboarding stats (in_progress, completed, overdue_tasks, avg_completion_rate)
Backend: Create onboarding from template - tasks copied correctly
Backend: Auto-complete onboarding when all tasks done
Frontend: Admin - Onboarding page loads with stats cards (In Progress, Completed, Overdue Tasks, Avg Completion)
Frontend: Admin - Active/Completed/Templates tabs visible and functional
Frontend: Admin - Create Template dialog with task builder
Frontend: Admin - Add tasks with categories, due days, required flag
Frontend: Admin - Start Onboarding dialog with employee/template selection
Frontend: Admin - View onboarding details with progress
Frontend: Admin - Task list in details dialog
Frontend: Employee - My Onboarding navigation link visible
Frontend: Employee - My Onboarding view with welcome message
Frontend: Employee - Task list grouped by category
Frontend: Employee - Progress bar and stats (Completed, Remaining, Overdue, Days Left)
Frontend: Employee - Complete task dialog with notes
Frontend: Employee - Task completion updates progress
critical_code_review_comments: OnboardingTemplate model correctly stores tasks array with all required fields (title, description, category, due_day, is_required, order, resource_url)
Onboarding model properly copies tasks from template and adds completion tracking fields (completed, completed_at, completed_by, completion_notes)
Auto-complete logic correctly marks onboarding as completed when all tasks are done
Stats endpoint provides comprehensive metrics including overdue task count and average completion rate
Employee view correctly shows task categories, overdue indicators, and progress tracking
seed_data_creation: Test templates and onboardings created during testing were cleaned up. One active onboarding remains for Sarah Johnson (employee) for demonstration purposes.

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: Employee 'My Onboarding' navigation link missing from sidebar
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Added NavLink for '/onboarding' with label 'My Onboarding' for non-admin users

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: /api/onboardings/my endpoint not finding employees - was only checking 'email' field
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Updated query to check email, work_email, personal_email, and user_id fields

context_for_next_testing_agent: Onboarding module is fully functional. Backend APIs all working with 100% test coverage. Frontend has admin view with template management, onboarding assignment, and progress tracking. Employee view shows 'My Onboarding' with task list, progress stats, and task completion dialog. Two bugs were fixed during testing: (1) Added 'My Onboarding' link for employees in sidebar, (2) Fixed /api/onboardings/my to search multiple email fields. Task categories supported: documentation, it_setup, training, compliance, introduction, administrative, other. Onboarding statuses: not_started, in_progress, completed, on_hold. Auto-complete triggers when all tasks are marked complete.
